rev.desc.rev.desc: Approval Enablement supporting
Approval Enablement Supporting
AGMRQ10H3367, Code changes to make the running PD/non-PD request in parallel possible
add control for can approve authority handlling for pd request in panel: setup.queries
if jscall("ProcessDesignerEnablement.isRequestEnabled") then
$L.approveAuth.pdrm=val(nullsub(jscall("security.getRights", "Request", "approvals"), false), 4)
$L.pdrm.sql=false
add control for pd request query based on
ProcessDesignerEnablement.isRequestEnabled
add the following in panel: setup.queries
$L.pdrm.sql="file.name=\"request\" and current.pending.groups isin "

if (not (null(denull(approver.of in $G.myGroups))) and lng(denull(approver.of in $G.myGroups))>0) then ($L.pdrm.sql=$L.pdrm.sql+str(denull(approver.of in $G.myGroups))) else ($L.pdrm.sql=$L.pdrm.sql+str({operator()}))
also add $l.pdrm.sql into $L.own.sql and $L.delegate.sql in the same panel
QCCR1E63322:Users are not prompted for comments after the first Denial or Retraction action
Update for support Line Item Approval.
DE4619 - remove hardcoded $title string "Approval Inbox". Used scmessage with number CC-Approval Inbox in scmenu class.
Change in setup.queries to not add opertators in approval groups that are already there. DE3168
Hua: change setup.queries to add delegation groups

Hua: relace $show.comments with $fg.approval and move it to the start panel. Sincel approval.inbox will be running in foreground and approve action may require comments as well (as defined in Object record).
DE1639- Added condition sothat the unauthorized message will not display when in approval inbox. Modified panel decide.operator. Changed the following condition:
null($G.ocmq.environment) or null(approval.groups in $G.ocmq.environment)
To:
null($G.ocmq.environment) or null(approval.groups in $G.ocmq.environment) and $L.format~="approval.inbox.display"

Approval Enablement Supporting
AGMRQ10H3367, Code changes to make the running PD/non-PD request in parallel possible
add control for can approve authority handlling for pd request in panel: setup.queries
if jscall("ProcessDesignerEnablement.isRequestEnabled") then
$L.approveAuth.pdrm=val(nullsub(jscall("security.getRights", "Request", "approvals"), false), 4)
$L.pdrm.sql=false
add control for pd request query based on
ProcessDesignerEnablement.isRequestEnabled
add the following in panel: setup.queries
$L.pdrm.sql="file.name=\"request\" and current.pending.groups isin "

if (not (null(denull(approver.of in $G.myGroups))) and lng(denull(approver.of in $G.myGroups))>0) then ($L.pdrm.sql=$L.pdrm.sql+str(denull(approver.of in $G.myGroups))) else ($L.pdrm.sql=$L.pdrm.sql+str({operator()}))
also add $l.pdrm.sql into $L.own.sql and $L.delegate.sql in the same panel

Hua: change setup.queries to add delegation groups

Hua: relace $show.comments with $fg.approval and move it to the start panel. Sincel approval.inbox will be running in foreground and approve action may require comments as well (as defined in Object record).
DE1639- Added condition sothat the unauthorized message will not display when in approval inbox. Modified panel decide.operator. Changed the following condition:
null($G.ocmq.environment) or null(approval.groups in $G.ocmq.environment)
To:
